mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO his_config_info ( id, nid, data_id, group_id, app_name, content, md5, gmt_create, gmt_modified, src_user, src_ip, op_type, tenant_id ) VALUES
( #{record.id}, #{record.nid}, #{record.dataId}, #{record.groupId}, #{record.appName}, #{record.content}, #{record.md5}, #{record.gmtCreate}, #{record.gmtModified}, #{record.srcUser}, #{record.srcIp}, #{record.opType}, #{record.tenantId} )
